title: The OG Bad Boy, Cardi B. Come Up, Sheryl Underwood, Herschel Walker and more.
itunes:title: The OG Bad Boy, Cardi B. Come Up, Sheryl Underwood, Herschel Walker and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Who ready for that "new new" ish? The fellas were having a hard time figuring out who TF is Fatima. Cardi B. got a new house. The original bad boy stopped by to set the record straight about domestic violence. Our girl from The Talk got a specific question for The King that hits him at his core. Steve gives the sickest advice to Ray J. A Heisman Trophy winner could be the next one canceled. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog has a message just for Cancel Culture!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
